ygData.subject: Time To Die, Nemisis!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I have some plans. And, just to let you know, they just might actually work. Then we’ll see if the Alliance is the most powerful factor in the Beast

Yes, I have some plans. And, just to let you know, they just might actually 
work. Then we�ll see if the Alliance is the most powerful factor in the 
Beast Wars. We�ll see. Than it�ll be MY turn to brag.
And the Maximals DO rule! Because they�re the coolest! AND�all of them work 
hard to succeed at their goals.
That�s what counts! Because their goal is to win the Beast Wars and send 
their enemies packing. And with all their determination, they�ll do it!
And don�t be so cocky. Without those gestalts the Maximals would have the 
Alliance retreating with their tails between their legs. Besides, I plan to 
do something to even the odds with those gestalts.
No offence�just wanna get you back for that vat of acid crack. ;D
Oh! And Merry Christmas weekend to everyone too!




* Iron Raptor swears under her breath as she watches her shots miss, 
growling and then moving in the target lock in a bit to aim towards 
Nemisis�s chest.
But then she growls again as he suddenly activates his com-link and calls in 
a message to Zardus.
After pressing the triggers of the auto-mounted weapons again, sending 6 
charges towards Nemesis, she calls over the noise of the battle.*

� So weak you can�t even fight your own battles without a little help? Get 
down her and I�ll give you a reason to call reinforcements!�

* She was more powerful now, but this mounted pair of blasters was weighing 
her down and she couldn�t use her body to it�s top abilities. Slightly, in 
the back of her mind, she wished that she could use those pinfeathers on her 
back to fly, meeting Nemisis Enforcer on his own field of battle.
And also, she slightly wondered just what Prowl was up to now, hoping that 
he was alright and kicking some butt, rather then it being opposite and HIS 
tail feathers on the line.
Iron Raptor quickly thought, in order not to distract Prowl from what he was 
doing.*

< How�s it going, love?>

* But she had little time to receive anything right away if she had tried, 
seeing Nemisis suddenly yell out over the noise and send a rather large 
assault of charges towards her.
Iron Raptor quickly moved the guns back into place behind her shoulders and 
took out her sword, then wondering slightly what the little fuzz-ball in her 
back compartment was doing. It had been a rough jog over here and she hoped 
that he wasn�t too shaken up. But she couldn�t let him go, not out into a 
battle like this.
Moving her legs to brace for impact, Iron Raptor extended the shield on her 
left arm as she held the sword ready by her right cheek.
A few second before the charges hit she called back over her shoulder 
towards Tavatron as she delt with her own problems.*

� How are you holding up?!�

* But then the first of the charges hit, striking the shield and making it 
buck back slightly with the impact. But then something happened, something 
that Iron Raptor hadn�t expected.
The shield had absorbed the charges energy!
The blade of the sword glew for a moment after the shield had taken the 
energy from the charge and transferred it through Iron Raptor�s body and 
into the sword itself.
A few more charges hit the shield and they were absorbed too, but some also 
missed. There were a few though, which had landed fairly close and the 
impact of them shattered the occasional rock, sending shards of it towards 
Iron Raptors armor.
Cutting through a bit and digging into her skin/armor under.
She winced.
This fight wasn�t going well, not at all!
But then, suddenly feeling the sword very hot in her hands, and without even 
knowing it, Iron Raptor found herself lowering the shield and retracting it, 
simply leaving her out in the open, the sword�s blade glowing very brightly.
The battle mechanism as kicking in now.
The handle of the sword now so hot it was burning her palm. But she didn�t 
notice, glaring at Nemisis Enforcer from under her helm.*

� Play? If you insist!�

* The blade of the sword suddenly exploded with light, the blade so blinding 
that she didn�t dare look at it.
A sudden burst of invisible energy erupted from the sword, blowing up dirt 
all around Iron Raptor, her cape flapping in the wind, which seemed to 
surround her.*

� But I�m warning you! I play ROUGH!!!�

* Concentrating on a small flicker of light which seemed to be her still 
point and center, Iron Raptor called upon that flicker with her thoughts and 
strength. Soon, that flicker developed into a roaring inferno, and it was 
then that a bright sphere of purple light developed around Iron Raptor, the 
color of the power the sword had created.
Then, at the second her eyes snapped directly towards Nemisis the orb 
expanded, in a split second.
From only the size of a small house to that of a large building, the energy 
exploded up and out. Any enemy within its � mile radius would most likely 
feel its power. But this was directed towards Nemisis, and it would only be 
him who could feel the pain and be defeated by it, if she had done it right.
Which was yet to be seen.*
